title: Quora Cracks Down on Anonymous Users
description:
< ![CDATA[ < div > < img width = '670' height = '335' src = 'http://cdn.makeuseof.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/quora-featured-670x335.jpg?856a97' class = 'attachment-large size-large wp-post-image' alt = '' / > < /div> < p > Quora is cracking down on users & #8217; ability to hide behind a veil of anonymity. The vast majority of actions will no longer be available to anonymous users, and everything else will be reviewed before publishing. The reason? The usual spammers and harassers, of course. For the uninitiated, Quora is a website where some people ask questions, and other people answer them. Yes, it is a little like Yahoo Answers, but the quality of the questions and answers published on Quora is a little higher than those published on Yahoo Answers. Just. Quora has always allowed people to post anonymously. This...

title: Top 10 Recipes From the July/August 2016 Issue of EatingWell
description:
Enjoy all the fruits and vegetables summer has to offer with new healthy recipes from EatingWell Magazine. Grill Hasselback Zucchini for a quick summer side, toss up some spiralized sesame noodles for a potluck party and chill out with our frosty Raspberry Prosecco Pops (for grown-ups). With additional recipes for summer slaws, fresh tomatoes and dinner on the grill, get inspired with these new summer recipes.
Garlic-Parmesan Hasselback Zucchini
Vietnamese Spiralized Sesame Noodles with Scallops
Vietnamese Spiralized Sesame Noodles with Scallops
Raspberry-Peach-Mango Smoothie Bowl
Carrot & Radish Slaw with Pickled Onions
Grilled Chicken Taco Salad
Tomato Sandwiches with Basil-Anchovy Mayo
Jalapeño-Watermelon Margaritas
Farmers’ Market Sliders
Honey-Roasted Cherry & Ricotta Tartine
Raspberry-Prosecco Pops
